Html:
Hi - Thank you for the awesome toolkit.

I am thinking of incorporating Microsoft's unity since my app will have many views.  

Do you have any example code with multiple views using unity and the ViewModelLocator?

Hi,

I am using Unity with the ViewModelLocator in my MIX10 session.

Check the code and video from here:

http://blog.galasoft.ch/archive/2010/03/16/sample-code-for-my-mix10-talk-online.aspx

Cheers,

Laurent
